863240.name: LOTR LCG- Mithril Bonus Pack
863240.description:
The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game requires that during Early Access players purchase either a Founder's Pack or this Bundle in order to play the game.

Similar to the table top game which inspired it, The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game follows a unique game economy where you purchase only the items in game that you wish to own. There are no random packs to buy.

NOTE: This DLC Bundle includes the main game, The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game.

The Mithril Bonus Pack includes the contents of all three Founder's Packs: The Shire, Steward of Gondor, and Istari Packs.

The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game Core Set

  • 4 Heroes
  • 68 Player Cards
  • Classic and New Sauron Card Backs
  • Classic and New Player Player Backs
  • 3,000 Valor Points

Shire Founder's Pack Items:
  • 5,000 Bonus Valor Points (for a total of 8,000 points)
  • Exclusive Shire Player Tag
  • Exclusive Shire Player Avatar and Frame
  • Exclusive Shire Card Back
  • Frodo Avatar Unlocked
  • A Friend in Need (Uncommon) Card Unlocked

Steward of Gondor Founder's Pack Items:
  • 13,000 Bonus Valor Points (for a total of 16,000 points)
  • Exclusive Steward of Gondor Player Frame and Avatar
  • Exclusive Steward of Gondor Player Tag
  • Exclusive Steward of Gondor Card Back
  • Aragorn Avatar Unlocked
  • Reinforcements (Uncommon) Card Unlocked
  • Ghân-buri-Ghân (Rare) Card Unlocked

Istari Founder's Pack Items:
  • 27,000 Bonus Valor Points (for a total of 30,000 points)
  • Exclusive Istari Player Frame
  • Exclusive Istari Player Avatar
  • Exclusive Istari Card Back
  • Gimli and Arwen Avatars Unlocked
  • Star Brooch (Uncommon) Card Unlocked
  • Beorn (Rare) Card Unlocked
  • Tom Bombadil (Legendary) Card Unlocked

Valor Points are the in-game currency which can be used to unlock Valor Cards.
